widget_provider: Titan Embeds (switched from WidgetBot due to service outage)

citizen.description: Chat with fellow citizens about active mobility, share experiences, and plan community rides

expert.description: Technical discussions on infrastructure design, policy analysis, and research data

administrator.description: Coordinate implementation strategies, share best practices, and discuss governance

politician.description: Policy discussions, legislative strategies, and constituent engagement approaches

corporate.description: Business opportunities, CSR initiatives, and public-private partnerships

setup_instructions: 1. Visit https://widgetbot.io/ and add the bot to your Discord server
2. Go to https://widgetbot.io/dashboard and select your server
3. Create separate widgets for each persona channel
4. Copy the channel IDs from Discord (Enable Developer Mode > Right-click channel > Copy ID)
5. Replace the REPLACE_WITH_*_CHANNEL_ID placeholders above with actual channel IDs
6. Update invite codes if using channel-specific invites
7. Test each widget to ensure guest mode and permissions are working
verification_checklist: [ ] WidgetBot bot added to Discord server
[ ] All persona channel IDs updated in this config
[ ] Guest posting enabled for all persona channels
